text: Parma is a city in the region of Emilia-Romagna. It is the capital of the Province of Parma. About 190,000 people live in Parma. It has one of the oldest universities of the world, the University of Parma. Parma has a humid subtropical climate (Cfa in the KÃ¶ppen climate classification). ==References== Category:Capital cities in Italy
title: Parma
